author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: ChefConf Preview
entry.content:
Join us as we preview ChefConf 2015!

This episode will be broadcast on Friday, March 6, 2015 at 20:00:00 UTC.

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Video - Tune in Friday, March 6, 2015 at 20:00:00 UTC
    • Audio - Coming Soon

Panel

  • Christine Draper twitter, github
  • Jessica DeVita twitter
  • Karolin Beck twitter
  • Brandon Burton github, twitter
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog

Outline

  • The when and where of ChefConf
  • Walk through the schedule, each participant should discuss their talk
  • Share past experiences with ChefConf
  • What are you most excited about?

Picks

Christine

Jessica

Karolin

Brandon

Nathen

  • St. Baldrick's Foundation - My son's St. Baldrick's team

Download

  • Video - Tune in Friday, March 6, 2015 at 20:00:00 UTC
  • Audio - Coming Soon

The Food Fight Show is brought to you by Bryan Berry and Nathen Harvey with help from other hosts and the awesome community of Chefs.

The show is sponsored, in part, by Chef.

Feedback, suggestions, and questions: info@foodfightshow.com or http://github.com/foodfight/showz.

entry.title: Zookeeper, the Secret Sauce
entry.content:
Show Date: Tuesday, 12 March 2013

In this episode, we sat down with Matt Wise, Ben Hartshorne and Charity Majors to talk about using zookeeper with Chef and Puppet.

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Picks
  • Download
    • Audio
    • Video Stream

Watch Now

Panel

  • Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere
  • John Vincent, aka Lusis twitter, github
  • Charity Majors github, twitter, blog
  • Ben Hartshorne github, twitter, blog
  • Matt Wise

Show Notes

  • Matt uses kazoo
  • Matt developed zkwatcher
  • Matt's post on creating a service registry w/ zookeeper
  • Ben and Charity are using the zookeeper gem
  • Ben's blog post on distributed locks with zookeeper

Picks

Bryan

  • CS 162
  • Java is the new C

Matt Wise

  • logstash

lusis

  • Lusis is looking for someone to take over his awesome project Noah
  • Lusis presentation on Noah

Ben Hartshorne

  • ZooKeeper
